SageTVPlugin.Name: BlueTwo (addon for MBDiamond)
SageTVPlugin.Description:
BlueTwo Grey Theme based on MBDiamond Theme - adds minor changes to MBDiamond to add BlueTwo backgrounds and some grey elements - needs MBDiamond Theme (will install as a dependency) - offers 2 themes - one with the default focus element and one with a green focus
** thanks to jorton for his great theme MBDiamond
SageTVPlugin.Author: jusjoken
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.03 No changes - just moved the files 1.02 Minor updates to the green focus element for recordings 1.01 Minor updates to some grey elements 1.00 Initial release
